title: BTC price up 160% in 2023 — 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
description:
Bitcoin prepares to seal a remarkable comeback this year — can BTC price stay the course until the yearly close?

Bitcoin (BTC) begins the Christmas holidays with a bump as BTC price tests support at a crucial time.

The last week of 2023 is already seeing volatility — and in the year where BTC/USD is up more than 160%, anything can happen.

What are traders’ expectations for the yearly close?

Read more

title: Japanese Cabinet Approves Tax Reform Eliminating Unrealized Crypto Gains Tax for Companies
description: The Japanese government has approved a tax reform that removes some crypto taxes for corporations and conglomerates. The reform, discussed since early December, removes the unrealized gains taxes on crypto holdings for companies, paving the way for them to hold crypto assets more consistently. Japanese Government Approves Tax Reform to Eliminate Unrealized Gains Tax The […]

title: Meme Moguls (MGLS) Announces a $20K Giveaway as Crypto Analyst Ali Martinez Reveals Bullish Ethereum (ETH) Price Prediction
description: The cryptocurrency sector is filled with excitement. Meme Moguls (MGLS) has recently made headlines by revealing a substantial $20,000 giveaway.
